required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Oral Sodium Oligo-mannurarate (GV-971) in Healthy Chinese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo Controlled Single and Multiple Dose Study to Assess the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Sodium Oligo-mannurarate (GV-971) Capsule in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and pharmacokinetics of GV-971 capsules after oral a single or multiple doses of 900 mg, 1200 mg and 1500 mg in healthy subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Cmax will be determined after oral 900 mg, 1200 mg and 1500 mg of GV-971
T1/2 will be determined after oral 900 mg, 1200 mg and 1500 mg of GV-971

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
primary_outcome.description: AUC will be determined after oral 900 mg, 1200 mg and 1500 mg of GV-971

primary_outcome.measure: Time to the peak drug concentration (Tmax)
primary_outcome.description: Tmax will be determined after oral 900 mg, 1200 mg and 1500 mg of GV-971

secondary_outcome.description: AE occurred after oral 900 mg, 1200 mg and 1500 mg of GV-971

facility.name: Phase-I Clinical Research Unit at Shanghai Xuhui Center hospital
